definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Cold-test parameter is the premise of the beam and wave interaction calculation.
sentences.chinese: 行波管的冷参量是电磁波与电子注互作用计算的基础。

sentences.english: A detailed numerical calculation for the propagating wave's dispersion characteristics has been made.
sentences.chinese: 对环板行波管的导波特性进行了详细的数值模拟分析。

sentences.english: Absolute instability is a major physics limitation in the realization of the ultimate capability of gyro-traveling-wave tube.
sentences.chinese: 绝对不稳定性是制约回旋行波管性能的主要因素之一。

sentences.english: The quality of Travel Wave Tube will decide the performance of radardirectly.
sentences.chinese: 行波管品质的优劣将直接影响雷达的性能。

sentences.english: Travel Wave Tube is the one of core part of transmitter in radar.
sentences.chinese: 行波管是雷达发射机中的核心部件之一。

sentences.english: TWT is an apparatus that can amplify the energy of microwave.
sentences.chinese: 行波管是一种将微波进行能量放大的装置。

sentences.english: Absolute instability is a major physics limitation in the realization of the ultimate capability of gyro- traveling - wave tube.
sentences.chinese: 绝对不稳定性是制约回旋行波管性能的主要因素之一。

sentences.english: Traveling wave tube gain and phase matched operation (TWTGPM) is key device in power synthesize technique.
sentences.chinese: 在功率合成技术中，幅相一致行波管是核心器件。

sentences.english: The reason of spurious oscillations in CCTWTs has briefly analysised in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中简要分析了耦合腔行波管产生自激振荡的原因。

sentences.english: Carbon nanotube(CNT) arrays have prominent advantages for travelling wave tube(TWT) as cold cathode application.
sentences.chinese: 碳纳米管阵列用于行波管冷阴极具有显著的优越性。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the application of CPLD in monitoring and controlling system of TWT transmitter.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了CPLD在行波管发射机监控系统中的应用。

sentences.english: The mechanism of suppressing mode competition in gyrotron traveling wave tube amplifier with helical corrugation is illuminated.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了螺旋波纹波导回旋行波管克服模式竞争的机理。

definition: klystron (electronic tube used to produce high frequency radio waves)

pinyin: ban4 dao3 ti3 tan4 ce4 qi4
